product_description: Please understand that as the glassware are fragile, the damage will occur during the transit. You can do the following options once got broken product. 1.Contact us for refund. ( If the remaining items are enough to use) 2.Contact Amazon for replacement. ( If replacement is required ) ULAB Glass Beaker Set, Griffin, Low Form, with Spout, Single Scale, 50ml 100ml 250ml 500ml 1000ml 1pc of Magnetic Stir Bar Offered ( Octahedral, Teflon PTFE resin coated. Dia.8mm x L38mm) Component Materials: Type I Class A - 3.3 Borosilicate Glass Attributes: ASTM Reference - E960 Specification for Laboratory Glass Beakers Autoclaving: This product will withstand repeated standard autoclave cycles of 121°C at 15 psi for 5 minutes. Heating / Cooling: This product is designed for heating by hot plate, flame, oven, microwave or heating mantles. In normal service it can be heated many times to 230°C. It can be heated one time to 490°C in extreme service. This product can be cooled to -230°C. DO NOT plunge product directly into a liquid coolant. Place the product in the vapor phase of the liquified gasses for slow cooling prior to immersion in the coolant. Vacuum / Pressure: This product is not designed for and is not rated for vacuum or pressure applications. Sterilization: Shipped Not Sterile After-Sales Service ULAB Scientific guarantees that no sale is complete unless the customer is satisfied. If you have any questions or suggestions on our products or service, please do feel free to contact us. You'll get our reply within 24 hours. Thanks for your patience.

product_description: Your Experiments Just Got Easier Coming with 5 glass graduated measuring beakers, 2 cleaning brushes, it has everything you need for the laboratory, whether professional, home-based, or at school, they will provide you with greater accuracy and ease of use for any task. When carrying out tests and experiments, you want to be able to trust your equipment completely. Not only are the cylinders in this set highly accurate down to the milliliter, but they are also made from tough lab-grade glass that is resistant to heat. Feature: - Laboratory essentials - Clear & accurate scales - Low thermal expansion - High chemical durability - Durable & heat resistant Specification: Material: Borosilicate glass Size: 1000 ml beaker: 158 x 105mm / 6.2 x 4.1inch (Height x Diameter) 500 ml beaker: 118 x 87mm / 4.7 x 3.4inch (Height x Diameter) 250ml beaker: 99 x 72mm / 3.9 x 2.8inch (Height x Diameter) 150ml beaker: 80 x 62mm / 3.1 x 2.4inch (Height x Diameter) 100ml beaker: 72 x 54mm / 2.8 x 2.1inch (Height x Diameter) 50ml beaker: 59 x 49mm / 2.3 x 1.9inch (Height x Diameter) Notice: 1. Beakers will begin softening above 800 °C (~1500 °F). Any temperature below this should be a good operating temperature; 2. The temperature differential that beakers can withstand before fracturing is about 165 °C (329 °F). 3. Light shooting and different displays may cause the color of the item in the picture a little different from the real thing. The measurement allowed error is +/- 1-3cm. Package Contents: 5 * Measuring beakers(1000ml, 500ml, 250ml, 150ml, 100ml, 50ml) 3 * Glass dropper pipettes 2 * Cleaning brushes 2 * Glass stir sticks
